AODCore.render_base



abstract class Render_Base;
The base of rendering, I suppose if you wanted to create your own entity, text, etc for some reason you could use this.

bool R_Visible();
Is the render_base visible? (is it rendered)

ubyte R_Layer();
Returns layer

void Added_To_Realm();
Called whenever AOD adds this to the realm (no reason to have a Removed_From_Realm since doing so calls the destructor)

abstract void Render();
Does rendering to the screen

abstract void Update();
Called once every frame. Meant to be overriden.
